title: File Previews
content:
Quick viewing tools

  • cat: print entire file
  • less: scroll/search large files
  • head/tail: first/last lines
printf "one\ntwo\nthree\n" > sample.txt
cat sample.txt
head -n 2 sample.txt
tail -n 1 sample.txt
less sample.txt

Search inside less

Press /, type a word, Enter; use n/N to navigate matches; press q to quit.
